backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with hotel, room, booking, payment, user profile, invite token, and access-control types and maps, including storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all major frontend files, describing routing, components, hooks, styling, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme definitions with light/dark variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container, metadata, favicon, and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive regression checklist covering auth flows, role behavior, room management, booking flow, and UI validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, router configuration, auth/role guards, and overall application shell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the current build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin bookings overview panel displaying all bookings in a table with status badges and details dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Admin UI to view hotels, toggle active status, and change subscription state with backend mutations and badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Interface for generating and listing invite tokens bound to hotel principals with validation and copy support.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays access‑denied messaging, role requirements, and optionally a hotel activation form with navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Error screen for permission checks with retry logic that invalidates role queries and reloads the page.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form for validating and consuming invite tokens to activate a hotel account, showing status and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate that forces authenticated users without a saved profile to complete name/email/phone before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access until the user logs in with Internet Identity, showing a login prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards child components by checking user role, admin status, and hotel activation, showing loading, error, or access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Provides a dialog displaying detailed booking info with optional guest principal copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Booking form allowing users to enter dates and guests, calculate price, and submit a new booking.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a status badge with variant and label based on booking status.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Displays an image preview in a dialog with a close button and optional title.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Shows real-time authentication, role, admin, and hotel activation diagnostics for debugging.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Lists hotel bookings in a table with details, status badges, and view dialogs.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Allows hotel owners to add or remove payment methods and displays existing ones.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form panel to view and update hotel profile fields with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Displays eligible bookings and allows marking stays as completed via mutation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Shows room photos with fallback handling and optional compact layout with clickable thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages hotel rooms, including listing, creating, editing, and uploading room images.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription and activation status with contextual alerts and payment info.
Provides app layout with top navigation, main content area, and footer including build version.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Simple locale selector allowing switching between available languages.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing links and login/logout actions based on user authentication, role, and hotel profile.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact details and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription scenarios.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Shows a hotel's payment methods and provides buttons to contact the hotel via WhatsApp or email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, resetting dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and loads stored identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user roles, profiles, admin status, invite tokens, and related mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles room image uploads by converting files to data URLs while tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a simple locale context with persistent storage for switching and accessing the current language.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and charts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays authentication status, user role, hotel activation state, and tools for validating/consuming invite tokens and granting admin access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard containing invite token management, hotel visibility, and booking administration panels.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of hotels with thumbnails, fallback images, and a preview dialog for browsing available listings.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest booking summaries, navigation to browse hotels or view account status, and a table of the user's reservations.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Provides the hotel management interface with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscriptions, loading the current hotel profile.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected hotel including rooms, pricing, photos, and booking form, with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Renders the main menu with navigation logic for guest and hotel portals, checking authentication, roles, and hotel activation state.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces and enums mirroring Motoko backend types, including hotels, rooms, bookings, profiles, and admin operations.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Provides a helper to detect debug mode based on environment or URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Contains currency formatting utilities, supported currency definitions, and helpers for displaying money values.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Provides utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs, including handling failed loads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, plugins, and theme extensions for the app.
project_state.json: Describes the regression state and requirements to restore missing role-based panels and fix admin token generation after v26.
